Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Northbound Reroute near Harrison/Dearborn
ShortDescription: Northbound 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Polk and Dearborn: due to, street blockage near Harrison/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Polk and Dearborn: due to, street blockage near Harrison/Dearborn.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
